title: THEO: Your-Context-Powered AI
description:
Turn your business documents and website into an AI-ready knowledge base in minutes. Upload to any AI assistant (ChatGPT, Claude) to create your context-aware strategic co-pilot. No more explaining who you are or what you do - get consistently relevant outputs that truly reflect your business.

✨3-min setup. 
✨10-min processing. 
✨Zero learning curve. 
✨First structuring FREE.

Create your custom AI assistant that genuinely understands your business context. Instant team superpowers!
